headline: CNN Live Event/Special
subHeadline: All the Best, All the Worst 2023. Aired 10-11p ET

utterances.speaker: KAITLAN COLLINS, CNN HOST
utterances.sentences: B.J. Chisholm, we'll be paying close attention to this year, especially on this show. So, please keep us updated on where this goes from here. Thank you for joining us tonight.

utterances.speaker: CHISHOLM
utterances.sentences: Thank you.

utterances.speaker: COLLINS
utterances.sentences: And thank you all so much for joining us tonight and every night. The Source has launched this year. A great moment for us as we close out 2023. I hope you all have a very safe and Happy New Year. I hope you're all rooting on Alabama on New Year's Day when they play against Michigan.We'll see you in 2024, because up next here, CNN is going to take a special look back at 2023 with All the Best, All the Worst, starts right now. (BEGIN VIDEO CLIP) TOM FOREMAN, CNN HOST (voice-over): 2023 was a year like no other in big news, politics, movies, music, culture, science, sports and more. Everyone seemed to be going all-in, all the time. And now it's time to take a look at the whole crazy year with our guests, Laura Barron- Lopez, Omar Jimenez, Laura Coates, John Berman, Charlotte Wilder, Coy Wire, and Max Foster. We're playing for keeps. It's All the Best, All the Worst 2023. (END VIDEO CLIP) FOREMAN (on camera): Welcome. I'm Tom Foreman, and it's worth asking, how did we get through the past 12 months? Many of us hoped it would be easier than recent tumultuous years. And there were moments of accomplishment, community and joy. But we were also challenged, divided over issues, and often unable to agree even on what we want. And it was wildly apparent where we begin with the biggest news stories of the year. (BEGIN VIDEOTAPE) FOREMAN (voice-over): The worst big news for many Americans started in their pocketbooks.

utterances.speaker: COY WIRE, CNN SPORTS CORRESPONDENT
utterances.sentences: The economy this year was an absolute emotional roller coaster.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Unemployment was down. Earnings were up at any moment. A lot was going well.

utterances.speaker: JOHN BERMAN, CNN HOST
utterances.sentences: But even then, for a lot of people, it just didn't feel quite right.

utterances.speaker: LAURA COATES, CNN HOST
utterances.sentences: It's flying high in April, shot down in May.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Worries about inflation, bank failures and debt became an inferno of fear, fanned by the most unaffordable housing market since the early 1980s.

utterances.speaker: CHARLOTTE WILDER, HOST, MEADOWLARK MEDIA
utterances.sentences: I'm a millennial. We don't buy houses.

utterances.speaker: MAX FOSTER, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: I think the reality for a lot of people is that they haven't seen any benefit of the growth in economies. They've just seen the rich getting richer.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Best development for union fans, a steady march of labor action among writers and actors, coal miners, healthcare workers, automakers and more.

utterances.speaker: OMAR JIMENEZ, CNN CORRESPONDENT
utterances.sentences: I think this was the year that people put their feet down to try and say, all right, enough is enough.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The worst news for a rattled workforce, the surge of artificial intelligence capable of drawing, writing, creating fake video, and what looks like real people.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: My name is Ivan. What's your name?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: My name is Jane.LAURA BARRON-LOPEZ, CNN POLITICAL ANALYST: I'm someone who loves sci- fi and I really do think that this could run out of control.

utterances.speaker: WIRE
utterances.sentences: Artificial intelligence is both fascinating and frustrating.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Some big companies are betting billions it is the best new tech trend, but it could also affect 300 million jobs worldwide.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: Look, for me, A.I. begins and ends with the Terminator, right?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: I'll be back.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: If there are robots that are going to take over the earth and enslave mankind, then I'm nervous.Short of that, I'm intrigued, and I want to know where it's going. UNIDENTIFIED MALE: Trust me.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Internationally, the best continuing resistance goes to Ukraine, closing in on two years of standing up to Russian invaders.

utterances.speaker: VOLODYMYR ZELENSKYY, UKRAINIAN PRESIDENT
utterances.sentences: Evil cannot be trusted.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: The stakes are, of course, people's lives. And the stakes for Ukraine is they're fighting for their very existence.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The worst warning sign, for Vladimir Putin, it was a brief uprising by his own troops. But for Ukraine, the worry came from some U.S. Lawmakers who want to pull back on assistance.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The worst new conflict, which is an old one, came from Hamas militants who launched a surprise attack on Israel, murdering, ransacking and taking hostages. Then Israel hit back hard.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: You run to the papers or your phone to see if this conflict has spread. And every day, there's a very real possibility that it might.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Demonstrations, anger and attacks reared up in many places, far from the initial clash.

utterances.speaker: COATES
utterances.sentences: I've been really surprised by the rise of anti-Semitism.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The best way to rise to the times goes to King Charles. He waited 70 years to gain the throne of the United Kingdom, but his coronation was filled with modern touches.

utterances.speaker: FOSTER
utterances.sentences: He didn't justify the Lord's Ladies, the aristocrats, the establishment. He invited a cross-section society. He reflected different faiths in the service. And that was a big shift, really, from the queen's coronation.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The best and worst case of high anxiety, give it to that Chinese balloon drifting over the U.S. for a week before being shot down.BARRON-LOPEZ: If I had thought that the Chinese were spying on us, I would have expected it to be in the form of like a robot human or an unidentified flying object that can move faster than the speed of light.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: China said it was just a weather balloon. Still, it added to growing friction with the U.S. over military, economic and political security.

utterances.speaker: WILDER
utterances.sentences: I think they're going to have a very hard time existing in the lunchroom together.Foreign Policy Expert Charlotte Wilder, like and subscribe.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Closer to home, there were other worries from that toxic train crash in Ohio.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Flames above the treetops, well over 100 feet in the air, and it was terrifying.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: To protest after Tyre Nichols died following a police beating in Memphis.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: This is a failing of basic humanity toward another individual.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: There were no signs of any real progress addressing mass shootings. This year, they happened in California, Utah, Texas, Tennessee, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Maine, and so many more places.BARRON-LOPEZ: It feels as though people in America are just becoming desensitized to the fact that this is a regular aspect of our life now.

utterances.speaker: COATES
utterances.sentences: When I was young, I was doing the tornado drills. Now, my kids, they're in fifth and fourth grade, and they have mass shooting drills.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Guilty verdict. Verdict, guilty. Verdict, guilty.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: On the crime front in South Carolina, Alex Murdaugh was convicted of the headline-grabbing murder of his wife and son.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Rex Heuerman, an architect.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In New York, DNA from a pizza box led to the arrest of an architect in the Gilgo Beach murders. He says he's not guilty.In Las Vegas, a man was arrested in the shooting death of legendary rapper Tupac Shakur almost 30 years past. He also says he didn't do it. But in Alabama, Joran van der Sloot told authorities he did kill teenager Natalee Holloway back in 2005, ending her family's long wait for confirmation.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: It's over. Joran van der Sloot is no longer the suspect in my daughter's murder. He is the killer.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Hurricane and tropical storms hit both U.S. coasts. Tornado's hammered the midsection, and floods rose all over. It's all, once again, the best call for action on climate change.

utterances.speaker: COATES
utterances.sentences: It's here and it's real.

utterances.speaker: WIRE
utterances.sentences: It does seem if we don't do anything, things are going to continue to get worse. FOREMAN

utterances.speaker: WILDER
utterances.sentences: And you're like, oh my god, it was orange here for a little while. It was apocalyptic.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: This was the worst thing to happen to us from Canada since Tim Hortons.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Still, the most stunning and devastating natural disaster, the wildfire that swept Hawaii.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: You don't think about wildfires and Hawaii in the same sentence.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: More than 100 people dead, thousands homeless, scores driven into the ocean.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: So, we swam and tread water there holding the kids.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: I'd love to do it right now.

utterances.speaker: MULLIN
utterances.sentences: We'll stand your butt up.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: You stand your butt up.SEN. BERNIE SANDERS (I-VT): Oh, hold on. Oh, stop it. And we will throw in some Taylor-made music too. It's All the Best, all The worst 2023. (COMMERCIAL BREAK) (BEGIN VIDEOTAPE) FOREMAN (voice-over): Let's go to the movies where no film was more in the pink than Barbie. She elbowed aside a pack of He-Man heroes to become one of the best box office hits, with global ticket sales close to $1.5 billion. That's with a B as in Barbie.

utterances.speaker: WILDER
utterances.sentences: I think it is an absolute triumph. I've watched it many times.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: Disclosure, I worked for the same company that Barbie works for. But it was a wonderful movie.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: Yes, Spider-Man Across the Spider-Verse is definitely my favorite superhero movie from this year.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Action films were roaring through sequel land 2, John Wick, Fast X, Creed III.

utterances.speaker: COATES
utterances.sentences: My favorite one was Mission Impossible. I'm a sucker for any spy thriller.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Best stunt overplayed in the worst way, Tom Cruise's motorcycle jump in the latest Mission Impossible saga, which, of course, proved to be completely possible.

utterances.speaker: FOSTER
utterances.sentences: Yes, I mean, he's phenomenal, isn't he?

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And while another old favorite drew solid audiences, it may have been the worst way to wrap up a long franchise. Ah, Indiana, what were you thinking?Best big movie about bigger than life characters, Oppenheimer, even if the film was slightly longer than World War II. BARRON-LOPEZ: I know it was three hours long, but actually the first time I watched it, it didn't feel three hours to me.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The best movie about the worst parts of business, got to give it to Dumb Money. The best movie to sneak in a reunion, Air found Matt Damon and Ben Affleck telling the story of Nike.

utterances.speaker: WILDER
utterances.sentences: I like to refer to air as Good Will Hunting Part 2, actually.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And the worst idea to charge into any theater.BARRON-LOPEZ: I liked Cocaine Bear. I was busting up, laughing the whole time in the movie theater.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In kids' films, the Super Mario Brothers, Puss in Boots, and The Little Mermaid rose to the top.

utterances.speaker: WIRE
utterances.sentences: We're seeing a lot of effort to make old classic movies more diverse. And I think that's a good thing.

utterances.speaker: COATES
utterances.sentences: But you know what? A Little Mermaid makes me hungry when I watch it for seafood.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Five Nights at Freddy's scared up a ton of money, even as many true horror fans found it five nights too many.

utterances.speaker: WILDER
utterances.sentences: I do not like to be scared. Sorry. What's going on around me is scary enough.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Best way to work the box office, Sound of Freedom was heavily pushed by churches and made about a quarter billion dollars worldwide.There were as always late arrivals rushing into the Oscar race, some with real shots at the top prize. But our award for the best return by one of the best directors goes to Martin Scorsese and Killers of the Flower Moon, great story, great cast, great filmmaking. (END VIDEOTAPE) FOREMAN (on camera): Interestingly, one of the hottest films at the box office this year was a concert movie custom-made for everyone who did not get into the sold out tour. Yes, it's time to talk about this year's music and the woman who was playing for keeps like no one else. (BEGIN VIDEOTAPE) FOREMAN (voice-over): It was no contest. The best of the best in pop music was the unbeatable, unstoppable force of nature, Taylor Swift.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: These shows weren't just a series of shows. These were masterpieces.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: She spent the whole year making music history, grabbing headlines.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: She gets good seats at football games now, really good seats.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And blasting her own songs off the charts with her other songs.

utterances.speaker: WILDER
utterances.sentences: I'm obsessed with Taylor Swift. I think she's a brilliant songwriter. I think she's a brilliant singer. I think she's a brilliant performer, producer.

utterances.speaker: FOSTER
utterances.sentences: And she does it all by just sort of dedicating herself to her fans, giving them what they want and really caring.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Swift even eclipsed Beyonce who had her own massive tour in film. The two of them and the Grammys made one thing clear above all else. COATES

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: This year was undeniably the best for Bad Bunny.BARRON-LOPEZ: I like Bad Bunny. I'm one of those Mexicans who can't speak Spanish, but I still love listening to Latin music.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Not the worst for Drake.

utterances.speaker: WIRE
utterances.sentences: Drake is still going. He's like the Tom Brady of music.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And it was solid for the weekend too.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: This was a pretty good year for music.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: But it was hard for anyone to top the likes of Doja Cat painting the town red.

utterances.speaker: COATES
utterances.sentences: I mean, the lyrics are probably not nine-year-olds ready, but my daughter loved it.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And our best breakout group, Boy Genius.

utterances.speaker: WILDER
utterances.sentences: I love boy genius. Shout out to the boys.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Best examples of breakup bravado.Selena Gomez killed it with Single Soon. And Miley Cyrus set it with flowers.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: It feels just like an authentic voice. It doesn't feel like she's putting on an act.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Worst case of the blues, Ed Sheeran.For all that, Billboard's song of the summer was a country tune for the first time in almost 50 years, Morgan Wallen's Last Night. At the Country Music Association Awards, the best song went to Luke Combs cover of a Tracy Chapman classic.

utterances.speaker: COATES
utterances.sentences: Luke Combs loved that song and he did it justice, and she agreed. I'm happy.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Best breakout country hit, Megan Moroney's Tennessee Orange.Best comeback, give it to The Beatles in the form of a decades old demo gussied up and released as Now and Then.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: No matter how good the song was, it was lovely to hear all of them on something again.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And our best TikTok track of the year because, yes, that's a thing.

utterances.speaker: FOSTER
utterances.sentences: Well, there are artists now who signed to TikTok rather than a record label.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In politics, basic facts were once again under fire. With the two main parties far apart on almost every issue, it was so divided, so cutthroat, so vicious, you can only wonder who would want to be in office.(BEGIN VIDEOTAPE) FOREMAN (voice-over): Up against inflation worries, immigration issues, overseas entanglements and unproven accusations of influence peddling involving his son, President Joe Biden faced the worst trend for anyone seeking re-election, plummeting public confidence.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: He's way under 50 percent, and that's a bright flashing warning sign.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: He argued unemployment is low, job creation high, and America's international reputation is rising.JOE BIDEN, U.S. PRESIDENT: The state of the union is strong.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: But even many Democrats told pollsters they were disappointed.BARRON-LOPEZ: you're seeing a lot of young voters, Arab and Muslim voters be very angry with the president in a way that we haven't seen in a long time. And if that persists, it could cause a big problem for him in swing states like Michigan.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The Democratic president's troubles were the best thing for all the Republicans vying for the White House in 2024.GOV. RON DESANTIS (R-FL), PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE: Biden's neglect has been atrocious.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: But, first, they have to get past Donald Trump.DONALD TRUMP, FORMER U.S. PRESIDENT: Well, thank you very much.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: He spent the year polling so far ahead for his party's nomination, he refused to answer his challenger's rare attacks.

utterances.speaker: NIKKI HALEY, REPUBLICAN PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE
utterances.sentences: I think that he put us $8 trillion in debt and our kids are never going to forgive us for that.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: Yes, he may have skipped maybe all the debates by the time this whole process is over.

utterances.speaker: COATES
utterances.sentences: It is shocking to me that in a year before a presidential election that his opponents cannot even capitalize on it.

utterances.speaker: TRUMP
utterances.sentences: This is a scam.

utterances.speaker: WILDER
utterances.sentences: I feel like we've come full circle in politics -- has become professional wrestling in the worst possible way.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: And his party?

utterances.speaker: LINDSEY GRAHAM, REPUBLICAN SENATOR
utterances.sentences: Fraud.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Seventy percent of Republicans still believe the worst lie that Joe Biden in 2020 did not really win.LAURA BARRON-LOPEZ, CNN POLITICAL ANALYST: The majority of the Republican establishment has not severed themselves from Donald Trump. They've enabled him, they've resuscitated him after the January 6th insurrection.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The worst family feud. Give it to Congress where lawmakers on the far right turned picking a House Speaker into blood sport, reluctantly accepting California's Kevin McCarthy, booting him out.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: The office of Speaker of the House of the United States House of Representatives is hereby declared vacant.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Then grinding through several more candidates to finally agree on Louisiana's Mike Johnson.BARRON-LOPEZ: I've covered Congress since 2013 and I've never seen anything like it.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: I oppose this measure.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Deep divisions between and within the parties led to the worst stalemate in ages, which drew the government to the brink of a shutdown twice, bristled with obstruction and made tempers run short.MARKWAYNE MULLIN (R-OK), U.S. SENATOR: You want to do it now? SEAN O'BRIEN, TEAMSTERS PRESIDENT: I'd love to do it right now.

utterances.speaker: MULLIN
utterances.sentences: Well, stand your butt up then.

utterances.speaker: MAX FOSTER, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: I think the rest of the world has looked at what's happened in Washington in politics in recent years, but particularly this year, as complete chaos and completely unsettling as well.

utterances.speaker: ERIC ADAMS, NEW YORK CITY MAYOR
utterances.sentences: We are fully cooperating.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The year brought plenty of accusations of malfeasance, the extraordinary expulsion of a congressman, and plenty of denials, too.BOB MENENDEZ (D-NJ), U.S. SENATOR: Not only will I be exonerated, but I still will be the New Jersey's Senior Senator.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: But the worst way to make people all judgy came from revelations that Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas accepted lavish gifts from Uber-wealthy conservatives for years.

utterances.speaker: JOHN BERMAN, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: I think a lot of people were shocked to learn how non-existent the ethics guardrails have been around the Supreme Court until this point.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The justices finally announced new public ethics rules, but --

utterances.speaker: WILDER
utterances.sentences: I think the Supreme Court has become so partisan.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Shame, shame.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Many political analysts believe the most explosive issue in the upcoming election could still be the court's 2022 ruling against abortion rights.BARRON-LOPEZ: It is going to be a massive factor in the 2024 election. Anytime, even in red states, when voters have been asked if they want more abortion access or less, they have chosen more abortion access.

utterances.speaker: COY WIRE, CNN SPORTS ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: I think the country right now at least feels more divided than it was four years ago because a big division, a big fissure occurred four years ago. And I think that has kind of remained and built to this sort of boiling point.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Worst reality for many voters, it's looking likely they will once again have to choose between the oldest candidates ever for president.

utterances.speaker: FOSTER
utterances.sentences: Obviously, I think a lot of the world sees two very old men who have their own weaknesses going into the most powerful position in the world and that raises a lot of questions.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Questions like is there any chance of a third contender slipping in?

utterances.speaker: DWAYNE JOHNSON, ACTOR
utterances.sentences: If that's ultimately what the people would want then of course I would consider it.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Maybe, but he's not running, at least not in 2024.(END VIDEOTAPE)

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: We are rocking on. Coming up, we will have highlights from the wild and wonderful world of sports. The shocking news about electric cars. And in just about --(BEGIN VIDEO CLIP)

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Six months.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: That's being what? Confident?

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Conky. Crazy.

utterances.speaker: WIRE
utterances.sentences: This was just two points shy of tying the highest scoring Super Bowl ever.

utterances.speaker: WILDER
utterances.sentences: And the Rihanna halftime show. Are you kidding me? She did it pregnant?

utterances.speaker: WIRE
utterances.sentences: I think this game, it represented a takeover. With Tom Brady retiring, this was now Patrick Mahomes League.

utterances.speaker: ANDERSON COOPER, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: Breaking news right now, a serious injury on the field during the Buffalo Bills Cincinnati Bengals game.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: The best comeback from the worst moment. Give that to Buffalo's Damar Hamlin, who suffered a terrifying cardiac arrest at the start of the year, but was back on the field this fall. UNKNOWN

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In baseball, the Arizona Diamondbacks wriggled into the World Series, only to be run over by the Texas Rangers in five games.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: The Texas Rangers are really, really good.BARRON-LOPEZ: When it's not a competitive World Series, it's not as much fun.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In the NBA, Laker LeBron James made the best basket, the one that took him past Kareem, Carl, Kobe, and Michael to grab the all- time scoring record.

utterances.speaker: WILDER
utterances.sentences: The oldest player in the league, he's in his 21st season, that's crazy.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: But the best team was the Denver Nuggets, who cooled off the Miami Heat to take home the Mile High City's first NBA trophy.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: Makes you think about all those kids who grow up skating on the frozen ponds around Las Vegas and in Florida.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: College sports saw the undefeated Georgia Bulldogs grab a second straight football championship.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Go Dogs.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: A semi-final between LSU and Iowa produced the most watched women's basketball game of all time.

utterances.speaker: LAURA COATES, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: These are incredible athletes. Give them their due, and then give them their pay equity, too.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In women's soccer, Spain won the World Cup, then had the worst scandal as the federation president forcibly kissed a player.

utterances.speaker: FOSTER
utterances.sentences: I was just amazed, astonished, and shocked.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: Messi, Messi.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: In men's soccer, international superstar Lionel Messi did the worst thing for the European leagues by moving his game to Miami. And 19-year-old Coco Gauff was the best female player at the U.S. Tennis Open, the first American team to take that title since the legendary Serena Williams in the 90s.

utterances.speaker: WILDER
utterances.sentences: Her climbing into the stands to see her family after, I mean, how can you not tear up?(END VIDEOTAPE)

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Following all the different sporting events is difficult, but you know what's harder? Keeping up with all the television being produced these days. There's just so much of it. Dramas, comedies, movies, documentaries, and so much more.

utterances.speaker: UNKNOWN
utterances.sentences: You have greater purpose than any of us could have imagined.

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: Game on. "The Last of Us", that post-apocalyptic series based on a computer game, had doubters at the start but --

utterances.speaker: OMAR JIMENEZ, CORRESPONDENT

utterances.speaker: FOREMAN
utterances.sentences: It's been a remarkable year, but you made it this far and that's an accomplishment. So, as we brace for the next 12 months, we want to leave you with our wishes for the year ahead.

utterances.speaker: JIMENEZ
utterances.sentences: My one wish is for people to legitimately for a day be able to pick someone and to go actually walk a day in their shoes.

utterances.speaker: FOSTER
utterances.sentences: I wish that everyone on social media would go and follow people they don't agree with and look at what those people say every day. My second wish is Taylor Swift tickets.

utterances.speaker: COATES
utterances.sentences: I want people to disagree agreeably. I'd love there to be some return of a sense of community that I think has been lacking for some time.

utterances.speaker: WIRE
utterances.sentences: Peace, love, joy, happiness, success, and pain. Because I think pain can be our greatest teacher.BARRON-LOPEZ: My wish for America in the coming year is that democracy holds strong, that it prevails.

utterances.speaker: BERMAN
utterances.sentences: You know, I just want to make it to the next one. My wish is for peace -- here's to hoping for peace in 2024.
